survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Network Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with various aspects of electric vehicle (EV) charging networks, including availability, ease of use, and payment methods.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users based on frequency of use. Recommend using radio buttons for single selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: This helps identify key decision drivers. Recommend checkboxes for multiple selections.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of charging stations in your regular travel areas?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistency. Recommend radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of charging stations in your regular travel areas?

questions.question_text: What payment methods do you typically use at EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with open text option (MULTI_CHOICE with conditional OPEN_TEXT)

script.question_text: What payment methods do you typically use at EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you've faced while using public EV charging stations.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you've faced while using public EV charging stations.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your primary charging network to other EV drivers?
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS-like question. Recommend radio buttons.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your primary charging network to other EV drivers?
